E

END_TURN - it.polimi.ingsw.controller.commands.CommandType
Used to declare the end of the turn (and then the turn passes to another player).
endPlayerTurn(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Artemis
This method calls superclass endTurn method, then resets movement count and previous cell at the end of Player's turn.
endPlayerTurn(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Demeter
This method calls superclass endTurn, then resets build count and previous cell at the end of Player's turn.
endPlayerTurn(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Eros
Calls superclass endTurn and resets the win condition flag to false.
endPlayerTurn(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.GodStrategy
This is the method used to execute actions at the end of player's turn.

Calls superclass endTurn and resets delegates properties.

This method calls superclass endTurn, then resets build count at the end of Player's turn.

Calls superclass endTurn and resets delegates properties.

Calls superclass endTurn and resets delegates properties.
endTurn() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Model
This method is called to end the turn of the current Player.
EndTurnButtonListener - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.listeners
This class is the listener of the EndTurnButton which is constantly present in RealGame phase

ErrorType - Enum in it.polimi.ingsw.model
ErrorType is the enumeration representing the specific Error which just occurred (in case a command hasn't gone well).
ErrorUpdate - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model.updates
This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time an error occurs.

executeBuild(Worker, Cell, BlockType) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Demeter
Decorates the standard executeBuild increasing the build count of MultipleBuildDelegate and saving a reference to the last buildCell using PreviousCellNeededDelegate.
executeBuild(Worker, Cell, BlockType) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.GodStrategy
This is the method used to execute a build action (change a cell level).
executeBuild(Worker, Cell, BlockType) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Hephaestus
Decorates the standard executeBuild increasing the build count of delegate and saving a reference to the last buildCell.
executeBuild(Worker, Cell, BlockType) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Hestia
Decorates the standard executeBuild increasing the build count of MultipleBuildDelegate
executeBuild(Worker, Cell, BlockType) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Poseidon
Decorates the standard executeBuild increasing the build count of MultipleBuildDelegate, if the Player is using unmoved Worker.
executeBuild(Worker, Cell, BlockType) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Prometheus
Decorates the standard executeBuild increasing the build count of MultipleBuildDelegate and setting to true the flag that indicates if Prometheus power was activated, if the worker hasn't already performed a move.
executeBuild(Worker, Cell, BlockType) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Zeus
Decorates the standard executeBuild by handling the case when Zeus is trying to build under itself.
executeGamePreparation(Worker, Cell, Worker, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.GodStrategy
This method is called once a match (for every player), to execute the game preparation phase and respect the god's constraints.
executeMove(Worker, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Apollo
Implements standard execute worker movement, but if moveCell is not empty, the opponent's worker that is occupying moveCell must be moved out of it, and this is done delegating to OpponentWorkerMoverDelegate.
executeMove(Worker, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Artemis
This method first saves the previous position using PreviousCellNeededDelegate in order to check that the Worker doesn't move an additional time to its initial position, then it executes standard move, finally movement count of MultipleMovementDelegate is increased.
executeMove(Worker, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Athena
Implements movement execution by calling superclass standard executeMove, setting the power flag if the God has moved up.
executeMove(Worker, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Eros
This method first calls superclass execute move to actually move the worker.
executeMove(Worker, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.GodStrategy
This is the methods used to execute a movement action (change a worker's position).
executeMove(Worker, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Minotaur
Implements standard execute worker movement, but if moveCell is not empty, the opponent's worker that is occupying moveCell must be moved to the backward Cell, and this is done delegating to OpponentWorkerMoverDelegate.
executeMove(Worker, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Pan
Implements standard execute worker movement, but if the level difference between previous Cell and the new Cell is greater than or equal to 2, Pan's Win Condition is triggered.
executeMove(Worker, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Prometheus
This method only moves to Worker to the specified moveCell and, if the Player didn't build before this movement, we set the selected Worker as the Worker which performed this movement.
extractSelectableColors(List<PrintableColor>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.UpdateHandler
Utility method used by CliUpdateHandler and GuiUpdateHandler to take the selectable colors from InitialInfoUpdate.
extractSelectedColors(InitialInfoUpdate) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.UpdateHandler
Utility method used by CliUpdateHandler and GuiUpdateHandler to take the already selected colors from InitialInfoUpdate.
extractSelectedNicknames(InitialInfoUpdate) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.UpdateHandler
Utility method used by CliUpdateHandler and GuiUpdateHandler to take the already selected nicknames contained in InitialInfoUpdate.
